verbose_text: Plates were coated with 100 mul of 10 mug/ml deglycosylated egg white avidin in PBS for 2 hours at 37degreesC, washed three times with PBS and blocked with 1% BSA in PBS (200 mul / well) for 1 hour at RT.
evidence: deglycosylated egg white avidin in PBS for 2 hours at 37degreesC, washed three times with PBS and blocked with 1% BSA in PBS (200 mul/well) for 1 hour at RT
